item.title: Congress MLA’s Kin Perform Rabbit Hunting Stunt
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: A brazen display unfolded on the streets of Raichur as Siddanagouda, brother of Maski Congress MLA Basanagouda Turvihal, and the MLA’s son Satishgouda faced public backlash for hunting rabbits.
The incident, tied to a fair in their village, saw the duo not only kill the animals but also parade them triumphantly, weapons in hand, along main roads. Photos and videos of the event, showing the rabbits dangling from a tree and the pair brandishing deadly tools, quickly spread across social ...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
